item.description:
Purchase your tickets for $30 @ www.salemspringfling.com: $35 at the door

Salem Spring Fling Saturday, March 30th from 6 to 9 PM
Old Town Hall Salem, MA

 

video clip here

Celebrate the Return of Spring at Salem's 6th Annual Bacchanalia! Come to a party fit for the Gods with a tasting of craft beer, fabulous wine, and culinary delights from Salem's best restaurants!
Enjoy the Art Bazaar, have your fortune told by the Oracle at Delphi and groove to the music of Qwill.

QWILL BAND VIDEO HERE

Qwill is the music vehicle of Boston-based singer/songwriter, multi-instrumentalist and producer, Jesse Ciarmataro.  His music layers indie, soul, electronic, and roots to create an ethereal, yet pulsating sound.  His live performances are known for various arrangements from a six piece band, to DJ sets and solo with live electronics or acoustic guitar and keyboard.

You'll meet familiar characters from myth and legend and enjoy the goddesses and nymphs that wander the "Garden of Earthly Delights."
item.name: Salem Spring Fling
